Code : factorial  
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Fact {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("\nenter the number for factorial");
		int n = sc.nextInt();
		int fact=1;
		for(int i = n ; i > 1 ; i--)
		{
			fact = fact*i;
		}
		System.out.println("factorail of number is : " +fact);

	}

}



code:sum and avg of array

import java.util.Scanner;

public class Array {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		 System.out.println("enter the size of array");
		 int n = sc.nextInt();
		 int arr[]=new int[n];
		 int sum = 0;
		 System.out.println("enter the elements in the array");
		 for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; i++)
		 {
			 arr[i]=sc.nextInt();
			 sum = sum+arr[i];
		 }
		 System.out.println("sum of elememts in the aray is:" +sum);
		 double avg=sum/n;
		 System.out.println("average of elements in the array is:"+avg);

	}

}
